thing-type.label: RF9540-N All Load Dimmer Light Switch

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Delayed OFF time
parameter.description:
time in seconds to delay OFF

Overview

The amount of time in seconds the switch will delay when trigger the delayed off feature

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Panic ON time
parameter.description:
Time in seconds for panic mode ON

Overview

The amount of time in seconds the switch will turn on for when panic mode is triggered

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Panic OFF time
parameter.description:
time in seconds for OFF in panic mode

Overview

The amount of time in seconds the switch will turn off for when panic mode is triggered

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Basic Set Value
parameter.description:
Send value to association group on trigger

Overview

Setting this to anything other than 0 will cause the value to be transmitted to devices in the association group when the switch is triggered. A setting other than 0 will likely result in undesired operation

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Power Up State
parameter.description: Power Up State of the switch

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Panic mode enable
parameter.description: Enables this switch to participate in panic mode

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Dimmer Ramp Time
parameter.description:
Time in seconds to reach desired level

Overview

The amount of time in seconds the switch will take to reach the desired dim level

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Kickstart / Rapid Start
parameter.description:
Turn on or off rapid start feature

Overview

Ensures that LED / CFL bulbs turn on when the preset dim level is low.Â  Enabling this feature may cause the lights brightness to momentarily be bright when the switch is turned on before reducing in brightness to desired level

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Minimum Dimmer Level
parameter.description: The minimum dim level the switch will allow

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: Maximum Dimmer Level
parameter.description: The maximum dim level the switch will allow
